name: District XiLin - 西林区
description:
If you haven't been to China, just play this game, because playing this game is similar to traveling. Welcome to District XiLin! This is an open-world city exploration game that takes place in a real Chinese city called XiLin. In this game, you will have the freedom to explore every corner of the city, visit various attractions, and experience the vibrant city walk.
As an open-world game, District XiLin features a vast map. You can stroll through the city, admire the beautiful scenery, and immerse yourself in the cultural atmosphere of the city.
In short, in District XiLin, you will be able to enjoy true freedom. Come join us and explore this beautiful city together!

The key operation: WASD controls the player to move, space to jump, and the mouse control the perspective.

Update plan: better graph, add stories.
